name: getgamesbytopic
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool diablo4_smartable.
Tool description: The Diablo 4 API offers the Diablo IV news, gameplays, guides, top players, and other information.
API description: Fetches game information by topic and page from the Diablo 4 Smartable API.

topic.description: The topic to search for within the Diablo 4 games.

page.description: The page number of the results to retrieve.
